data.quote: He who has a why to live for can bear any how.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possible find out how far they can go.
data.author: T.S Elliot

data.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: When you come out of the storm, you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm is all about.
data.author: Haruki Murakami

data.quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
data.author: Buddha
